tool.name: SAGA.statistics_grid.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.statistics_grid.7 GRID $GRID CONTIGUITY $CONTIGUITY DIALOG $DIALOG prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: CONTIGUITY
param.label: Case of contiguity
param.help: Choose case: Rook's case contiguity compares only cell wich share an edge. Queen's case contiguity compares also cells which share just corners.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Global spatial autocorrelation for grids calculated as Moran's I.
